mapper.update: update hz_FAQ set question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_id = #{testId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, question, course_id, test_id, creator_id, creator_name, create_time, answer, is_delete from hz_FAQ where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, question, course_id, test_id, creator_id, creator_name, create_time, answer, is_delete from hz_FAQ
